data.description: Result to be released privately via the Snapping mechanism.

name: snapping_mechanism

privacy_usage.description: Object describing the type and amount of privacy to be used for the mechanism release.

b.description: An upper bound on the absolute value of the quantity of interest being privatized.

return.description: Original data perturbed via the Snapping mechanism.

description: Privatizes a result by returning it perturbed via the Snapping mechanism.
